What is the ABI of the contract?
choices: ABI is the binary interface of the application. ABI is an interface between two software modules, one of which is often at the machine code level. In Ethereum, basically, you can encode Solidity contracts for EVM and, conversely, read data from transactions.
ABI is the Only use for Machine Code to implement in Blockchain.you can decode Solidity contracts for EVM & JVM and, conversely, read data from transactions.
